ABOUT US

A few things
about us

DIPL karaoke club Bol'shaya Kosinskaya Street, 45

Welcome to the professional karaoke club Dipl! The club was created by the founder of karaoke movement in Moscow - Alexei Smirnov. Being the founder of such clubs as: Who am I (Moscow), Who am I (Monaco), Lalada, Do Re, Solomay, Do it, club in Le Caves Courchevel, Alexey combined quality sound, interior and atmosphere of the holiday. We are waiting for you every day from 9 PM - 6 AM.

KARAOKE "DIPL" IS OPEN DAILY FROM 9 PM TO 6 AM.

The club has a system of face control and dress code. The administration of the club reserves the right to refuse to visit the club.
On Friday and Saturday the karaoke room has a deposit of 25$ per person.

Large Vip lounge

up to 30 people (the cost of the deposit depends on the day of the week, please check with the administration for details)

Medium Vip lounge

дup to 15 people (the cost of the deposit depends on the day of the week, please check with the administration for details)

Small Vip lounge

up to 10 people (the cost of deposit depends on the day of the week, please check with the administration for details)

The early opening fee is $100 per hour.
Renewal fee: every 30 minutes after 6 AM is $150, or $20 for 1 song.
